instructions: put the dinner plate on the table cloth
put the salad plate on the dinner plate
put the napkin on the salad plate
put the wine glass on the table cloth, up and more on the right than the plate
put the water glass next to the wine glass, slightly down
put the salad fork on the left of the plates
put the dinner fork between the salad fork and the dinner plate
put the dinner knife on the right of the dinner plate
put the soup spoon on the right of the dinner knife
